Olive Garden Italian Restaurant http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/olive_garden_italian_restaurant-b878851/ (503) 364-6885 1302 Lancaster Dr NE , Salem , OR 97301 44.9463544 -122.9837038 Send to Phone View Menu
Description
Own this business? Add an image Categories: Restaurants Write a Review Reviews Remember when Olive Garden used to be a good Restaurant? by mariah4653 - 10/13/2011
It seems like everything they serve now is out of a can and overpriced. Everything seems to be made with flavorings and fillers. Their prices are laughable considering that they are basically a sub-par Italian fast-food… Read More> It seems like everything they serve now is out of a can and overpriced. Everything seems to be made with flavorings and fillers. Their prices are laughable considering that they are basically a sub-par Italian fast-food restaurant. If you eat at McDonalds, you might think that their food is good. The same can be said for if you eat out of dumpsters. <Read Less
by Lily Y. - 09/10/2011
I came here at 11:30 and was seated immediately, no waiting time!
Our server was friendly and attentive. I had the chicken ceasar salad, and I asked for more veggies and less dressing, and it was good!
I... Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Mathew E. - 09/03/2011
Just finished an excellent dinner at Salem Olive Garden! Chris is a amazing server. Read Full Review on Yelp.com.
